message.body: I hope you don't have work today.
I don't, thank goodness!!! It got heavy pretty quick and I kept skidding on the road. Hope you don't have work either!
Nope no work for me today
Good. It's a pass out on the couch kind of night.
For some. I'm putting down flooring in my grandmas house.
Whoa, good for you. Hey, my nap didn't go that smooth. I left the TV on and Some noisy guy with an accent was yelling really loud on some restaurant show. Annoying!
Hope the weather is better tomorrow. Maybe I won't need/be tempted to take a nap then!
